pr_title: Fix HBase init error when Kerberos is enabled

timeline.message:
set indexlabel invalid if create or rebuild failed (#1226)

* set indexlabel invalid if create or rebuild failed
* also check if indexlabel invalid when query by index
* set vl/el to UNDELETED if fail to delete

Change-Id: If890b3bd8c441b63642a2006479cf4ccca9ddf67

Fix bug: hbase init error when kerberos is enabled
fix #1292

timeline.bodyText: can it be null? don't addResource if hbaseSite is null
timeline.author: javeme

replies.bodyText: This config item's default value is /etc/hbase/conf/hbase-site.xml.If not setting,program will get default value.
replies.author: tmljob

replies.bodyText: what happens if there not exist file "/etc/hbase/conf/hbase-site.xml"
replies.author: javeme
tmljob
